message:
Thank you so very much for the post!!!  
I have question about SynchronizationContext. I have a MVC5 app that triggers multiple ajax calls to load a page, and one of it is slow and other calls wait for it. After reading the MSDN resource you provided, I am surprised to know my MVC5 will not process async ajax calls at the same time even if I change them to use AsyncController. Is there a way to make the ajax calls not waiting on each other?
